wishlist.label: Project setup script
wishlist.desc:
Have a single script that asks you a series of questions about the project.  The idea?  When you first start a project (clone it from repo) you run the script, answer the simple questions, and it modifies the current project to hit the desires.  List of possible questions:
Name of project
app directory rename?
cakephp user name / password
 admin / root username / password
salt (sets random salt value by default)
set cipher seed
override default port
set local dns name (ie my.app or some such)

Also run any other 'normal' parts of setting up cakephp that can't be already in place via files.
